comment._content:
What a great collection of 50's style clothing.......

Love the flaring skirts and petticoats.......

and the tight dresses........

Notice the guys britches are actually up around their waist.....and not hanging below their knees.......!!!!!!!

Wonder what ever became of each and every one of these kids......?

We had our problems back then.....but somehow it just seemed more civilized.
